https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xsJfGY3KwOoNUNz8F86WYk0M56y.jpg Guna unites his brother and his lover after overcoming a number of problems. But when he falls in love with a girl who does not reciprocate his feelings, his brother's wife comes to his aid. Azhagiya Asura
